scripts.refactor: cross-env GZIP_ARTIFACTS=1 MINIFY_ARTIFACTS=1 ARTIFACT_TOP_N=5000 tsx src/pipeline.ts refactor
scripts.report: cross-env GZIP_ARTIFACTS=1 MINIFY_ARTIFACTS=1 ARTIFACT_TOP_N=5000 tsx src/pipeline.ts report
scripts.plan: cross-env GZIP_ARTIFACTS=1 MINIFY_ARTIFACTS=1 ARTIFACT_TOP_N=5000 tsx src/pipeline.ts plan
scripts.codemod:dryrun: cross-env GZIP_ARTIFACTS=1 MINIFY_ARTIFACTS=1 ARTIFACT_TOP_N=5000 tsx src/pipeline.ts codemod-dryrun
